intro:
You've come across some
training tools and supplies.
title: Training Session
description: These supplies look like they could be used to train a member of your party! There are a few ways you could train your Pokémon, by @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{battling and defeating it with the rest of your team}.

1.label: Light Training
1.tooltip:
(-) Light Battle with Chosen Pokémon
(+) Permanently Improve 2 Random IVs of Chosen Pokémon
1.finished:
{{selectedPokemon}} returns, feeling
worn out but accomplished!$Its {{stat1}} and {{stat2}} IVs were improved!

2.label: Moderate Training
2.tooltip:
(-) Moderate Battle with Chosen Pokémon
(+) Permanently Change Chosen Pokémon's Nature
2.select_prompt:
Select a new nature
to train your Pokémon in.
2.finished:
{{selectedPokemon}} returns, feeling
worn out but accomplished!$Its nature was changed to {{nature}}!

3.label: Heavy Training
3.tooltip:
(-) Harsh Battle with Chosen Pokémon
(+) Permanently Change Chosen Pokémon's Ability
3.select_prompt:
Select a new ability
to train your Pokémon in.
3.finished:
{{selectedPokemon}} returns, feeling
worn out but accomplished!$Its ability was changed to {{ability}}!

4.label: Leave
4.selected:
You've no time for training.
Time to move on.

option.selected:
{{selectedPokemon}} moves across
the clearing to face you...

outro: That was a successful training session!
